title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 135.2 - Persons eligible for restricted license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 135.2 - Persons eligible for restricted license

State Regulations
A restricted license shall only be issued to a person whose

New York State driver's license has been suspended or revoked pursuant to
section
318
or
510
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, who has been sent an order of such suspension or
revocation by the commissioner, who establishes his need for such license in
conformity with section
135.8
of this Part and who would
not be denied a restricted license pursuant to section
135.7
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
135.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
